displayName: Certificates should be issued by the specified integrated certificate authority
description: Manage your organizational compliance requirements by specifying the Azure integrated certificate authorities that can issue certificates in your key vault such as Digicert or GlobalSign.

metadata.displayName: Allowed Azure Key Vault Supported CAs
metadata.description: The list of allowed certificate authorities supported by Azure Key Vault.
'Audit' allows a non-compliant resource to be created, but flags it as non-compliant. 'Deny' blocks the resource creation. 'Disable' turns off the policy.
